targets.rawSql:
SELECT
	sum(charge_energy_added)
FROM
	charging_processes
WHERE
	$__timeFilter(end_date)
	AND car_id = $car_id;

WITH data AS (
  SELECT
		cp.id,
		cp.charge_energy_added,
		CASE WHEN NULLIF(mode() within group (order by charger_phases),0) is null THEN 'DC'
				 ELSE 'AC'
		END AS current
	FROM charging_processes cp
  RIGHT JOIN charges ON cp.id = charges.charging_process_id
  WHERE
	  cp.car_id = $car_id
	  AND cp.charge_energy_added > 0.01
	  AND $__timeFilter(end_date)
  GROUP BY 1,2
)
SELECT
	now() AS time,
	sum(charge_energy_added) AS value,
	current AS metric
FROM data
GROUP BY 3
ORDER BY metric DESC;

SELECT
	sum(cost)
FROM
	charging_processes
WHERE
	$__timeFilter(end_date)
	AND car_id = $car_id;

SELECT (
  SELECT sum(cost)
  FROM charging_processes
  WHERE $__timeFilter(end_date) AND car_id = $car_id
) / (
	SELECT convert_km((max(odometer) - min(odometer))::numeric, '$length_unit')
	FROM positions
	WHERE $__timeFilter(date) AND car_id = $car_id
) * 100

SELECT (
  SELECT sum(cost)
  FROM charging_processes
  WHERE $__timeFilter(end_date) AND car_id = $car_id
) / (
  SELECT sum(greatest(charge_energy_added, charge_energy_used))
  FROM charging_processes
  WHERE $__timeFilter(end_date) AND car_id = $car_id
)

SELECT
	sum(charge_energy_added)
FROM
	charging_processes
WHERE
	$__timeFilter(end_date)
	AND car_id = $car_id
	AND cost = 0;

WITH data AS (
	SELECT c.charging_process_id 
	FROM charges c
	LEFT JOIN charging_processes cp ON cp.id = c.charging_process_id
	LEFT JOIN addresses addr ON addr.id = cp.address_id
	LEFT JOIN geofences geo ON geo.id = geofence_id
	WHERE 
		c.fast_charger_present IS true
		AND c.charger_voltage = 2
		AND cp.car_id = $car_id
		AND (addr.display_name LIKE '%Supercharger%' OR geo.name LIKE '%Supercharger%')
	GROUP BY 1
)
SELECT
	sum(cp.cost) as total
FROM
	charging_processes cp, data
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(end_date)
  AND cp.cost IS NOT NULL
  AND cp.id IN (data.charging_process_id);

WITH data AS (
	SELECT c.charging_process_id 
	FROM charges c
	LEFT JOIN charging_processes cp ON cp.id = c.charging_process_id
	LEFT JOIN addresses addr ON addr.id = cp.address_id
	LEFT JOIN geofences geo ON geo.id = geofence_id
	WHERE 
		c.fast_charger_present IS true
		AND c.charger_voltage = 2
		AND cp.car_id = $car_id
		AND CASE 
			WHEN (cp.geofence_id IS NOT NULL) THEN (addr.display_name NOT LIKE '%Supercharger%' AND geo.name NOT LIKE '%Supercharger%')
			ELSE addr.display_name NOT LIKE '%Supercharger%'
		END
	GROUP BY 1
)
SELECT
	sum(cp.cost) as total
FROM
	charging_processes cp, data
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(end_date)
  AND cp.cost IS NOT NULL
  AND cp.id IN (data.charging_process_id);

WITH data AS (
	SELECT c.charging_process_id 
	FROM charges c
	LEFT JOIN charging_processes cp ON cp.id = c.charging_process_id
	WHERE 
		c.fast_charger_present IS NOT true
		AND c.charger_voltage != 2
		AND cp.car_id = $car_id
	GROUP BY 1
)
SELECT
	sum(cp.cost) as total
FROM
	charging_processes cp, data
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(end_date)
  AND cp.cost IS NOT NULL
  AND cp.id IN (data.charging_process_id);

SELECT
	COALESCE(geofence.name, CONCAT_WS(', ', COALESCE(address.name, nullif(CONCAT_WS(' ', address.road, address.house_number), '')), address.city)) AS location,
	COUNT(*) AS total_recharges,
	CASE
      WHEN SUM(charge_energy_added) < 1000 THEN SUM(charge_energy_added)::NUMERIC(4,0)::VARCHAR || ' kWh' 
      WHEN SUM(charge_energy_added) < 1000000 THEN (SUM(charge_energy_added) / 1000)::NUMERIC(9, 3)::VARCHAR || ' MWh' 
      WHEN SUM(charge_energy_added) >= 1000000 THEN (SUM(charge_energy_added) / 1000000)::NUMERIC(9, 3)::VARCHAR || ' GWh' 
  END as charge_energy_added,
  AVG(charge_energy_added) as average_energy,
  AVG(duration_min) as average_time,
  SUM(cost) as cost
FROM
	charging_processes c
LEFT JOIN addresses address ON c.address_id = address.id
LEFT JOIN geofences geofence ON geofence_id = geofence.id
WHERE
	$__timeFilter(end_date)
	AND car_id = $car_id
	AND (address.display_name ILIKE '%supercharger%' OR geofence.name ILIKE '%supercharger%')
GROUP BY
	1
ORDER BY
	SUM(charge_energy_added) DESC
LIMIT 10;

SELECT
  inserted_at AS "time",
  efficiency
FROM cars
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(inserted_at)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  ('$suc_stats'::json -> 'totalCost')::text::float AS total_cost,
  ('$suc_stats'::json -> 'averageCost')::text::float AS average_cost

SELECT
  ('$suc_stats'::json -> 'totalEnergy')::text::float  as total_energy,
  ('$suc_stats'::json -> 'averageEnergy')::text::float  as average_energy

SELECT
  ('$suc_stats'::json -> 'totalTime')::text::float  as total_time,
  ('$suc_stats'::json -> 'averageTime')::text::float  as average_time

SELECT
	COALESCE(geo.name, CONCAT_WS(', ', COALESCE(addr.name, nullif(CONCAT_WS(' ', addr.road, addr.house_number), '')), addr.city)) AS location,
	COUNT(*) AS total_recharges,
	CASE
      WHEN SUM(charge_energy_added) < 1000 THEN SUM(charge_energy_added)::NUMERIC(4,0)::VARCHAR || ' kWh' 
      WHEN SUM(charge_energy_added) < 1000000 THEN (SUM(charge_energy_added) / 1000)::NUMERIC(9, 3)::VARCHAR || ' MWh' 
      WHEN SUM(charge_energy_added) >= 1000000 THEN (SUM(charge_energy_added) / 1000000)::NUMERIC(9, 3)::VARCHAR || ' GWh' 
  END as charge_energy_added,
  AVG(charge_energy_added) as average_energy,
  AVG(duration_min) as average_time,
  sum(cost) as cost
FROM
	charging_processes cp
LEFT JOIN addresses addr ON cp.address_id = addr.id
LEFT JOIN geofences geo ON cp.geofence_id = geo.id
WHERE
	cp.id IN (
		SELECT c.charging_process_id 
	  FROM charges c
  	LEFT JOIN charging_processes cp ON cp.id = c.charging_process_id
  	LEFT JOIN addresses addr ON addr.id = cp.address_id
  	LEFT JOIN geofences geo ON geo.id = geofence_id
  	WHERE 
  	  $__timeFilter(cp.start_date)
  		AND c.fast_charger_present IS true
  		AND c.charger_voltage = 2
  		AND cp.car_id = $car_id
  		AND CASE 
  			WHEN (cp.geofence_id IS NOT NULL) THEN (addr.display_name NOT ILIKE '%supercharger%' AND geo.name NOT ILIKE '%supercharger%')
  			ELSE addr.display_name NOT ILIKE '%supercharger%'
  		END
  	GROUP BY 1
	)
GROUP BY
	1
ORDER BY
	SUM(charge_energy_added) DESC
LIMIT 10;

panels.title: Top recharges in other DC stations

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  inserted_at AS "time",
  efficiency
FROM cars
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(inserted_at)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  ('$dc_stats'::json -> 'totalCost')::text::float  as total_cost,
  ('$dc_stats'::json -> 'averageCost')::text::float  as average_cost

SELECT
  ('$dc_stats'::json -> 'totalEnergy')::text::float  as total_energy,
  ('$dc_stats'::json -> 'averageEnergy')::text::float  as average_energy

SELECT
  ('$dc_stats'::json -> 'totalTime')::text::float  as total_time,
  ('$dc_stats'::json -> 'averageTime')::text::float  as average_time

SELECT
	COALESCE(geo.name, CONCAT_WS(', ', COALESCE(addr.name, nullif(CONCAT_WS(' ', addr.road, addr.house_number), '')), addr.city)) AS location,
	COUNT(*) AS total_recharges,
	CASE
      WHEN SUM(charge_energy_added) < 1000 THEN SUM(charge_energy_added)::NUMERIC(4,0)::VARCHAR || ' kWh' 
      WHEN SUM(charge_energy_added) < 1000000 THEN (SUM(charge_energy_added) / 1000)::NUMERIC(9, 3)::VARCHAR || ' MWh' 
      WHEN SUM(charge_energy_added) >= 1000000 THEN (SUM(charge_energy_added) / 1000000)::NUMERIC(9, 3)::VARCHAR || ' GWh' 
   END as charge_energy_added, sum(cost) as cost
FROM
	charging_processes cp
LEFT JOIN addresses addr ON cp.address_id = addr.id
LEFT JOIN geofences geo ON cp.geofence_id = geo.id
WHERE
	cp.id IN (
		SELECT c.charging_process_id 
	  FROM charges c
  	LEFT JOIN charging_processes cp ON cp.id = c.charging_process_id
  	LEFT JOIN addresses addr ON addr.id = cp.address_id
  	LEFT JOIN geofences geo ON geo.id = geofence_id
  	WHERE 
  	  $__timeFilter(cp.end_date)
  		AND c.fast_charger_present IS NOT true
  		AND c.charger_voltage != 2
  		AND cp.car_id = $car_id
  	GROUP BY 1
	)
GROUP BY
	1
ORDER BY
	SUM(charge_energy_added) DESC
LIMIT 10;

SELECT
  inserted_at AS "time",
  efficiency
FROM cars
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(inserted_at)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  ('$ac_stats'::json -> 'totalCost')::text::float  as total_cost,
  ('$ac_stats'::json -> 'averageCost')::text::float  as average_cost

SELECT
  ('$ac_stats'::json -> 'totalEnergy')::text::float  as total_energy,
  ('$ac_stats'::json -> 'averageEnergy')::text::float  as average_energy

SELECT
  ('$ac_stats'::json -> 'totalTime')::text::float  as total_time,
  ('$ac_stats'::json -> 'averageTime')::text::float  as average_time

list.definition: SELECT name AS __text, id AS __value FROM cars ORDER BY display_priority ASC, name ASC;
list.label: Car
list.name: car_id
list.query: SELECT name AS __text, id AS __value FROM cars ORDER BY display_priority ASC, name ASC;

list.definition:
SELECT
	CONCAT('{
		   "totalEnergy": ', COALESCE(SUM(charge_energy_added), 0),', 
		   "averageEnergy": ',COALESCE(AVG(charge_energy_added), 0),', 
		   "totalTime": ',COALESCE(SUM(duration_min), 0),', 
		   "averageTime": ',COALESCE(AVG(duration_min), 0),', 
		   "totalCost": ',COALESCE(SUM(cost), 0),', 
		   "averageCost": ',COALESCE(AVG(cost), 0),'
		   }')
FROM
	charging_processes c
LEFT JOIN addresses address ON c.address_id = address.id
LEFT JOIN geofences geofence ON geofence_id = geofence.id
WHERE
	$__timeFilter(end_date)
	AND car_id = $car_id
	AND (address.display_name ILIKE '%supercharger%' OR geofence.name ILIKE '%supercharger%');
list.name: suc_stats
list.query:
SELECT
	CONCAT('{
		   "totalEnergy": ', COALESCE(SUM(charge_energy_added), 0),', 
		   "averageEnergy": ',COALESCE(AVG(charge_energy_added), 0),', 
		   "totalTime": ',COALESCE(SUM(duration_min), 0),', 
		   "averageTime": ',COALESCE(AVG(duration_min), 0),', 
		   "totalCost": ',COALESCE(SUM(cost), 0),', 
		   "averageCost": ',COALESCE(AVG(cost), 0),'
		   }')
FROM
	charging_processes c
LEFT JOIN addresses address ON c.address_id = address.id
LEFT JOIN geofences geofence ON geofence_id = geofence.id
WHERE
	$__timeFilter(end_date)
	AND car_id = $car_id
	AND (address.display_name ILIKE '%supercharger%' OR geofence.name ILIKE '%supercharger%');

SELECT
	CONCAT('{
		   "totalEnergy": ', COALESCE(SUM(charge_energy_added), 0),', 
		   "averageEnergy": ',COALESCE(AVG(charge_energy_added), 0),', 
		   "totalTime": ',COALESCE(SUM(duration_min), 0),', 
		   "averageTime": ',COALESCE(AVG(duration_min), 0),', 
		   "totalCost": ',COALESCE(SUM(cost), 0),', 
		   "averageCost": ',COALESCE(AVG(cost), 0),'
		   }')
FROM
	charging_processes cp
LEFT JOIN addresses addr ON cp.address_id = addr.id
LEFT JOIN geofences geo ON cp.geofence_id = geo.id
WHERE
	cp.id IN (
		SELECT c.charging_process_id 
	  FROM charges c
  	LEFT JOIN charging_processes cp ON cp.id = c.charging_process_id
  	LEFT JOIN addresses addr ON addr.id = cp.address_id
  	LEFT JOIN geofences geo ON geo.id = geofence_id
  	WHERE 
  		$__timeFilter(cp.start_date)
  		AND c.fast_charger_present IS true
  		AND c.charger_voltage = 2
  		AND cp.car_id = $car_id
  		AND CASE 
  			WHEN (cp.geofence_id IS NOT NULL) THEN (addr.display_name NOT ILIKE '%supercharger%' AND geo.name NOT ILIKE '%supercharger%')
  			ELSE addr.display_name NOT ILIKE '%supercharger%'
  		END
  	GROUP BY 1
	);

		   "totalEnergy": ', COALESCE(SUM(charge_energy_added), 0),', 
		   "averageEnergy": ',COALESCE(AVG(charge_energy_added), 0),',

list.name: ac_stats
list.query:
SELECT
	CONCAT('{
		   "totalEnergy": ', COALESCE(SUM(charge_energy_added), 0),', 
		   "averageEnergy": ',COALESCE(AVG(charge_energy_added), 0),', 
		   "totalTime": ',COALESCE(SUM(duration_min), 0),', 
		   "averageTime": ',COALESCE(AVG(duration_min), 0),', 
		   "totalCost": ',COALESCE(SUM(cost), 0),', 
		   "averageCost": ',COALESCE(AVG(cost), 0),'
		   }')
FROM
	charging_processes cp
LEFT JOIN addresses addr ON cp.address_id = addr.id
LEFT JOIN geofences geo ON cp.geofence_id = geo.id
WHERE
	cp.id IN (
		SELECT c.charging_process_id 
	  FROM charges c
  	LEFT JOIN charging_processes cp ON cp.id = c.charging_process_id
  	LEFT JOIN addresses addr ON addr.id = cp.address_id
  	LEFT JOIN geofences geo ON geo.id = geofence_id
  	WHERE 
  	  $__timeFilter(cp.end_date)
  		AND c.fast_charger_present IS NOT true
  		AND c.charger_voltage != 2
  		AND cp.car_id = $car_id
  	GROUP BY 1
	);
